events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated for several days and I'm getting worried about the delay.
The reported problem appears to be a delay in the delivery based on the customer's description of outdated tracking and late arrival.
An agent from the shipping support team has been assigned to handle this delayed shipment case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about the delay with your order. Let me check the status of your shipment right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can look up more detailed information about your package?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield. I appreciate your help.

Thank you for the details. I have contacted the shipping carrier and they confirmed an unexpected delay due to weather conditions. They expect delivery within 3-4 days. We will monitor your package and keep you updated.
Thanks for the update and for checking with the carrier. I understand the situation better now and appreciate your proactive support.
Your order has now been delivered successfully, according to the latest tracking update. We are glad the issue is resolved.
Just checking in to ensure you received your package in good condition and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not heard back and your package was delivered, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
